title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Highly anticipated series from acclaimed creator Vince Gilligan, boasting excellent critical reception (Metacritic 87) and strong audience scores (IMDb 8.1 with over 76K votes) on Apple TV.

title: IT: Welcome to Derry
overview: In 1962, amid a spate of unexplained disappearances of local children, a group of misfit friends begin to suspect a long-buried ancient evil lurking. As the kids set out to determine what's really going on, a rising unease prompts several townspeople to work together to restore peace – all while a U.S. military operation seeks to exploit Derry for its own objectives.
reason: A highly anticipated prequel from the creators of the successful 'IT' films, this HBO series has garnered significant audience interest with an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 71K votes.

title: Black Rabbit
overview: A rising-star restaurateur is forced into New York's criminal underworld when his chaotic brother returns to town with loan sharks on his trail.
reason: This Netflix crime drama features A-list actors Jason Bateman and Jude Law, drawing substantial audience engagement with over 39K IMDb votes and a solid 7.3 rating.

title: Boots
overview: After impulsively joining the U.S. Marine Corps, a bullied teen finds new purpose — and unexpected brotherhood — with his motley team of fellow recruits.
reason: This Netflix drama is well-received by audiences, achieving a strong 7.9 IMDb rating from over 22K votes and featuring acclaimed actress Vera Farmiga.

title: The Beast in Me
overview: A famous author is pulled into a twisted mind game with her rich, powerful new neighbor — who might be a murderer.
reason: Starring Emmy winners Claire Danes and Matthew Rhys, this Netflix mystery has attracted a large viewership, reflected in its 7.5 IMDb rating from over 21K votes.
